article.description: NC Central rolls past Coppin St. 87-63
article.headline: NC Central rolls past Coppin St. 87-63
article.linkText: NC Central rolls past Coppin St. 87-63
article.story: DURHAM, N.C. -- Jeremy Ingram scored 24 points as North Carolina Central controlled a decisive 87-63 victory over Coppin State Saturday afternoon. Ingram amassed 18 of his points in the first half to put North Carolina Central up 50-37 at the break. The score was 20-18 midway through the first half, but the NC Central Eagles went on a 30-19 run to pull away. Emanuel Chapman added 14 points, seven assists and six rebounds. North Carolina Central (13-5, 4-1 Mid-Eastern Athletic) shot 32 of 62 from the field and 9 of 16 (56.3 percent) from 3-point range. Taariq Cephas and Michael Murray scored 16 points each to lead the Coppin State Eagles, and Andre Armstrong added 12. Coppin State (6-13, 3-3) made the first basket of the game and then trailed the rest of the way, finishing at 33.3 percent shooting on both field goals (20 of 60) and 3-pointers (8 of 24).

statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover
